about.title: About Me
about.description: I have always been fascinated by dark fantasy worlds, forgotten legends, and the creatures that haunt ancient tales. I love exploring new worlds, experimenting with techniques, whether on canvas or a graphics tablet, and letting my ideas come to life in different forms. Curious and eager for discovery, I never limit myself to a single style or medium, as each project is a new adventure. What motivates me? Working on creative challenges that expand the imagination and bring to life stories that leave a lasting impression.
